instructions: On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google My Business app If you have multiple locations, open the location that you'd like to manage. Tap Profile . Select the day that you want to set special hours for. Enter the special opening and closing times. Open all day: Choose Open 24 hours . Closed all day: Choose Closed . Tap OK . To add more special hours, tap Add hours . Once you ve set all special hours, in the top right-hand corner of the 'Edit special hours' screen, tap Apply .
